description: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku kurinda umwana impanuka ?
title: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku kurinda umwana impanuka ?
content:
Buri mwaka, abana benshi bapfa bazize impanuka, abandi bajyanwa mu bitaro, bikabaviramo ubumuga buhoraho cyangwa se ubumuga bwo mu mutwe.

Impanuka zigera ku bana b’ikigero cyose, cyane cyane abana bari munsi y’imyaka inatu y’amavuko. Akenshi abana b’abahungu nibo bapfa bazize izo mpanuka.

Impanuka ziganje cyane, zituruka ku binyabiziga mu muhanda, kugwa hasi, mu byobo no mu mazi, ubushye, ndetse n’uburozi.

Impanuka zo mu muhanda no kurohama nizo ziteza abana akenshi ibikomere bikaba byabaviramo no gupfa. Ahantu hazwi cyane abana bashobora guhurira n’izo mpanuka ni mu ngo cyangwa se ha yaho batuye. Izi mpanuka ha ya zose kandi, zishobora kwirindwa.
Ingo, imiryango n’ubuyobozi bagomba gushyiraho ingamba zituma uburen-ganzira bw’umwana bwo gutura ahantu heza kandi hizewe bwubahirizwa mu rwego rwo kumurinda impanu.
